item.title: LVS DR
item.description: LVS DR Linux Virtual Server Direct Return We’re using a four server scenario: client, load balancer, backend server 1, backend server 2. Lost an hour trying to get ansible.openstack to work… not sure why the error feedback is so slow but ended up using bash instead. 2029 for server in $(openstack server list | grep voje-test | awk '{ print $4 }'); do echo $server; openstack server delete $server; done 2031 openstack server create --image focal-server-cloudimg-2021-01-05.
